Four Corners.definition: the contents of a document as interpreted without reference to or consideration of outside information
Four Corners.origin: [any evidence offered…must appear within the four corners of the will " Crump's Estate v. Freeman , 614 P.2d 1096 (1980)"]

1.1: the contents of a document as interpreted without reference to or consideration of outside information
